name: Neon Pipe!
description:
A 360° 2 players run n gun made during a 2.5 days game jam at Gobelins, inspired by Jet Set Radio & Splatoon.

Gameplay

You just found an awesome skateboarding spot with your friend: an abandoned construction worksite! You decide to go take a ride in the pipes and show everyone who owns the place by covering the existing graffitis with some cool-ass neon paint.

Controls

Player 1: Q/D to move • F/H to aim • G to paint

Player 2: ← → to move • Numpad 1/3 to aim • Numpad 2 to paint

Credits

Jonathan Baudillon - dev

Camille Huynh - dev

Léo Mirland- art & music

PF Dormegnie - game design & management

Font: Mr. Pixel by Christophe Badani
